text: Sir Stanley Ford Rous, CBE (25 April 1895 â€“ 18 July 1986) was the 6th President of FIFA from 1961 to 1974.Honorary President of FIFA , 1974: FIFA.com website. He was also secretary of the Football Association from 1934 to 1962 and was an international referee. ==References== Category:1895 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:Presidents of FIFA
